title: FitTrackerPro
description: A comprehensive fitness tracking web application that helps users monitor their health metrics. This tool features a BMI (Body Mass Index) calculator and a daily calorie needs estimator. Users can input their weight, height, age, and gender to receive personalized health insights. The clean, user-friendly interface makes it easy for individuals to track their fitness progress and set informed health goals.

title: Website Summarizer
description: A dynamic web application to summarize uploaded articles using OpenAI GPT-4 API.

title: Blockchain Farm
description: A decentralized application (DApp) that lets user farm X tokens and earn X tokens.
